node.text:
This happened a while ago , but I was ALREADY having a really hard week. Just to be violated on my way to class! Dude was on the bus trying to touch women , because the bus was packed and it’d probably come off as an accident . Some men are just absolute creeps . At the time I was really not up for arguing (it was the day before my birthday and I was feeling really low). I gave him a disgusted look and when it happened I was getting off of the bus , so I just didn’t make a big deal out of it. When I got in the building I went to the bathroom and cried . Not sure why , but it really really made me feel terrible. I wished I had stood up and yelled at him , but I was just already in a really bad place . Women have to deal with these types of random harassment all the time. It’s not okay and in the moment you just wanna get away from the person and situation. At the time I wasn’t really sure how to handle the situation. Now I know what to do If (hopefully not) something like that we’re to happen again. Just encouraging any woman who’s ever been in this position to speak up and embarrass  the creep! (@myprettyweeds) 🌱
